item.title: Fruit exploration action adventure game Fruitimo! announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
PLANETA, a Tokyo-based developer that has previously worked on games like Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island, Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet, and many others, has announced Fruitimo!, an action adventure game about a boy and his backpack android collecting fruits. It will launch for PC via Steam in September.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

A fruit-loving boy Vimita and his backpack-shaped android Grandpa team up in the action adventure to collect giant fruits!

Let’s explore the mysterious and fun theme park Kajune Land.

There are lots of curious places in Kajune Land!

juice river, sherbet hill, as well drones, robots, and even slides!

Huge fruits are hidden all over the park.

Vimita and Grandpa work together—throwing jelly, vacuuming up fruits, and questing for hidden treats using a search function.

Dive into the juicy and colorful world and collect all the fruits!

Watch the announcement trailer and first gameplay video below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.
